name: untilyouaresonude
text: We've all been there.

name: venividieffluxi
text:
We've all been the cat
on the floor
hanging up the phone
with grim finality.

name: apocowarg
text:
This is beautiful poetry. In my case:

I was the cat
on the deck
in the rain
hanging up the phone
with grim finality.

name: neonaoneo
text: This is some grade A comment right here.

name: gorrioncita
text:
this is internet babies writing poems about cartoon cats.

congratulations

name: draykid
text: I think I cried.

name: soticoto
text: All lying on the floor, staring at the power socket we once puked into in order to get to hell, thinking how easy it would be to do it again.

name: flynn
text: Hey kids, this is what being an adult is like!

name: anomalous3
text: The only difference is that you don't forget how mad you are at the other person

name: 7a65726f
text: The only difference is that you pay for your own Hormel Chicken Thighs in White Gravy.

name: cracklewater
text: Quality TM !

name: belgand
text: Yes you do. It typically corresponds to them either crying and making you feel like a main jerk or wanting to have sex.

name: jdhenry105
text: A comment left by jdhenry105 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dri-ft, riotnrrd, amandulence)

name: dropkickpikachu
text:
Look at you, thinking that a conversation like this has anything to do with dysfunction.

To be a child again... sweet nostalgia...

name: yingkaixing
text: This comment is funny because if both of you are to be believed, you are referring to a man five years your senior as a child wrapped in nostalgia, unaware of your own youth.

name: epicurus
text: This is completely a situation I could find myself in anywhere in the next five years, including the incorrect description of "Bran".

name: gompo
text: Amazing that they managed to keep those chicken thighs below 50% sodium.

name: tellumo
text: That's why they had to put them in the white gravy. Broth would have had too much water in it; they would have burst into flame before the box was sealed.

name: helloftubby
text: A comment left by helloftubby was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hellofyellin, Overmedicated, peterjoel)

name: luckypyjamas
text:
give him his props though

it was a hilarious point he made

name: tellumo
text: Well, yeah, usually it's tied up in the form of salts, but there weren't enough anions to match up with all of it, as the package contains 50% sodium by volume (assuming a 250 cm^3 package, that's 242 grams of sodium).

name: riazm
text:
Tellumo I have been following your progress with great interest and I can say that you are legit.

Here is your membership card and four coupons for a discount at either Belle Italia or the Co-Op.

name: sargasm
text: Magazines say to eat a zucchini at 2 pm.

name: tombsgrave
text: That click is very loud.

name: fielding
text: Comparatively.

name: the_doz
text: Uh, isn't it a cordless phone?

name: luckypyjamas
text: that was the click of molly's phone, she hung up really hard

name: the_doz
text: Damn, that is a loud click.

name: gournal
text: Daaamn, that's a long lace.

name: nagsworth
text: It is hell of a depressed clik.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: That clik speaks volumes.

name: tekende
text:
CLIKS

LOVE THEM

name: tpederson
text: I think I'm going to have to adopt the fetal wall stare/coffee grinder when I talk on the phone.  It looks comfy.

name: zaratustra
text: I do that when I have a tense call to make (such as one directed to a girl). The problem is that the floor is hard.

name: rodneystubbs
text: This is pretty much what I feel like any time I have to talk on the phone.  Or at least what it must sound like.

name: 60teeth
text: It's important to note that the chicken thighs are in white gravy.

name: dasilodavi
text: Heartbreaking.

name: incredibledeath
text: I can't believe Hormel trademarked quality.  They have yet to exhibit any.

name: stuart
text: this coming from a guy with an avatar promoting Spam

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: small times
Teodor: Election Night
Lyle: whisky
Little Nephew: Blump tha Vote

name: direhaggis
text: Sometimes all you have is the electric socket for visual entertainment.

name: achilleselbow
text: This is pretty much the conversation I have with my mom every time she calls. I am 24 :-(

name: pogo
text: Only people who really lov each other fight about bran.

name: hedonismbot
text: It's okay Pogo, I'd fight about bran with you.

name: clintisiceman
text:
The first time I saw this strip, I interpreted panel 5 as Beef explaining bran to Molly because she was of the past and did not understand.

Then I realized that I also do not know what bran looks like.

name: tekende
text: Me neither, but I mean who does? No one eats just plain bran. We eat things that have bran IN them. Like muffins and Raisin Bran.

name: applebed
text: I have seen bran. It is terrible brown flakes of woe. I would be more worried about someone's mental state to know they had been eating bran than extremely high-sodium boil-in-the-bag chicken.

name: greenkoolayd
text: bran is good for you, dude.  being all fibrous, and such, it helps your poo to stay manageable.

name: redheron
text: I don't know how to rate this! It makes me make the face on number one but I feel like it is a really good comic for making me feel sad that strongly! Poor Roast Beef!
